post.title: Lying to Myself
post.content: Well it didn't take long at all for me to get back on something related to this. Didnt unplug like I wanted to but did enjoy reading a Guide from AWS on Distributed Load Balancing using ECS on AWS Fargate, Lambda, and DynamoDB. Don't have much to say at the moment other then just let the scores from this blog show what sort of Load Testing this bring to the table. Maybe when I work on my github actions I will see if I can kick off a test from github actions or something. This would be pretty awesome for ensuring the realiabilty of Infrastructure and quickly Identifying unusual failures on a new build.
